487.name: Lazio
487.information: Coming all the way from the heart of Italy, we have the formidable Lazio, a team steeped in history, having been founded in the early 20th century, precisely in 1900. Known by their code 'LAZ', they have consistently shown what Italian football is all about.

The least productive period is between 16th to 30th minute with just 9.33% goals.","goals_conceded": "Lazio has conceded 25 goals at home and 33 on the road, bringing the total goals against to 58 with an average of 1.5 concessions per game.","conceding_timing": "They seem to be most vulnerable in the opening 15 minutes of the game, conceding 23.33% of their goals during this time.","streaks": "Lazio's biggest winning, drawing, and losing streaks all stand at 2 games each.","biggest_results": "Their biggest win at home was a 6-1 drubbing, while on the road it was a 4-1 victory. news.Marktwerte Italien: Thiaw großer Gewinne: Top striker Lautaro Martínez from Inter Milan is a significant market value winner in Serie A, reaching the 100 million Euro mark. This increase propels his club closer to SSC Napoli in terms of squad value, with Inter currently valued at 563 million Euros, just 25 million behind Napoli. Meanwhile, AS Roma is the biggest market value loser among Serie-A clubs amid a disappointing start to the season, with a decrease of around 19 million bringing their value down to 362 million Euros.

news.Bericht: Milan vor Verpflichtung von Che: AC Milan appears to be finalizing a deal to acquire the young talent Luka Romero from Lazio according to transfer expert Gianluca Di Marzio. The 18-year-old midfielder's arrival will be seen as a significant gain for the Rossoneri, who are also in talks for a number of other potential recruits. This move marks Milan's continued efforts to bolster their squad following the departure of Zlatan Ibrahimović.

30866.information: About the player's personal information:"Manuel Lazzari, a stalwart presence in the world of football, celebrates his 30th birthday today. Born on the 29th of November in 1993, Lazzari is a native of the picturesque town of Valdagno, located in the heart of Italy. A proud Italian national, he stands 174 cm tall and maintains a weight of 67 kg, portraying an impressive physical presence on the field." About his nationality and physical attributes:"Originating from Italy, Manuel Lazzari is a pride of the nation’s football community. With his height towering at 174 cm and weight at a solid 67 kg, Lazzari is a formidable figure, striding across the football field with unmatched agility and speed."

news.Lazio verlängert vorzeitig mit Rechtsver: Lazio Roma has prematurely extended the contract of right-back Manuel Lazzari. The 28-year-old signed for three more years until 2027, having initially joined the Biancocelesti in 2019 for 15 million euros from SPAL. Thus far, Lazzari has made 134 appearances for Lazio, contributing to 20 goals.

news.Kaufoption gezogen: Abwehrchef Acerbi bl: Inter Milan confirms the continuing services of defensive leader, Francesco Acerbi, following a decision to exercise a purchase option on the Serie A star previously loaned from Lazio Rome. No official statement regarding transfer amount has been released, although it is rumored to be around 3.5 million Euros. The 35-year-old, 2021 European champion, has had an illustrious career with 353 games in Serie A, with the majority under his current coach, Simone Inzaghi, who also fostered Acerbi's development during his time at Lazio.

news.Neben Leipzig auch Atalanta, FC Sevilla: In the exciting Europa League matches, Atalanta BC, RB Leipzig, FC Porto, and FC Sevilla have all moved on to the Round of 16. Despite Lazio Roma's draw with FC Porto, thanks to Porto's victory in the first leg, they advance further in the competition. Particularly noteworthy was Lazio's Danilo Cataldi, whose last-minute goal in the 94th minute ensured a draw for his team, though it wasn't enough to carry them through.

news.Hysaj bereits Teil des Lazio-Kaders – Ab: Defender Elseid Hysaj, formerly with Napoli, has now become part of Lazio Roma for the upcoming season, despite not being officially presented as a new addition. After six years and 223 appearances for Napoli, Hysaj said farewell to his fans on Instagram, thanking them for making him and his family feel at home. Hysaj, who moved from Empoli to Naples in 2015 for a transfer fee of 5 million Euros, expressed his commitment to wearing the jersey with honor over the years.

1863.statistics: {"PlayingStats": "Immobile has been phenomenal this season, making an appearance in 31 games and starting all of them. news.Auto stößt mit Tram zusammen: Lazio-Kapi: Lazio captain, Ciro Immobile, was involved in a car accident with a tram in Rome. Immobile suffered a whiplash and a broken rib and is currently at a hospital where his condition is stated as good. The duration of his recovery period remains unknown.

news.Lazios höchste Ablöse des Sommers: Basic: Lazio Roma has confirmed the signing of Croatian player Toma Bašić, who has switched from Girondins Bordeaux to the Italian side on a contract running until 2026. According to reports, Lazio will shell out a base fee of 7 million euros, which could rise by another million with bonus payments. This marks Lazio's third seven-figure transfer this summer, and the highest amount the club has spent on a single player for the upcoming season.

487.coach: {"Personal_Details": "The man in the coach's box, Maurizio Sarri is a 64-year old tactician born in Napoli, Italy. He's also known by his first name, M. Sarri, and besides being a respected football figure, he holds the Italian nationality.","Coaching_Career": "Let's talk about Sarri's impressive career. He started leading Lazio from June 2021, and before that, he was at the helm of Juventus, where he coached from June 2019 till August 2020. His tenure at Chelsea spanned between July 2018 and June 2019. Sarri's work in Napoli lasted from June 2015 to May 2018, and prior to that, he had a three-year stint with Empoli from July 2012 to June 2015. He also had spells with Sorrento and Alessandria, coaching there between July 2011 to December 2011, and July 2010 to June 2011 respectively."}

news.Nach Wett-Sperre: Newcastle erwägt Tonal: AC Milan's Sandro Tonali, who recently transferred to Newcastle United for a sum of 64 million, has been hit with a ten-month suspension for participating in illegal sports betting during his time with AC Milan and Brescia Calcio. This shocking development came out of the blue and has left Newcastle United reeling, as Tonali will be unfit for participation until the end of August 2024, missing the EM if Italy qualifies. In light of the unexpected situation, Newcastle's Sports Director, Dan Ashworth, is looking at potential replacements for Tonali this winter, while carrying out a legal review of the transfer and considering potential consequences for the player's contract breach.

news.Piatek trifft bei Debüt: Florenz gewinnt: Alexis Saelemaekers played a crucial role in AC Milan's Coppa Italia clash against Genoa CFC, helping in turning around an early setback in a thrilling match. Despite Genoa's initial lead through Leo Östigard, goals from Olivier Giroud, Rafael Leão, and Alexis Saelemaekers marked a spectacular comeback for Milan, clinching a spot in the tournament's quarterfinals. Saelemaekers' strong performance in the 112th minute breaking the deadlock was a pivotal moment in the match.

news.Nach Wett-Sperre: Newcastle erwägt Tonal: Newcastle United's £64 million summer signing, Sandro Tonali, has been shockingly suspended for ten months due to illegal sports betting while at AC Milan and Brescia Calcio, causing him to miss the Euro if Italy qualifies. Newcastle's Sporting Director, Dan Ashworth, expressed surprise and confusion over the suspension, but affirmed the club's support for Tonali while they consider legal ramifications and potential replacements. Ashworth, however, remained uncertain about potential repercussions for breach of contract and whether he would have reconsidered Tonali's signing if he had known about the pending suspension.

information.Player_intro: On the field today, we have Théo Bernard François Hernández, often known simply as Hernández. Born in Marseille, France, this French national has been making waves in the football world.
information.Player_age: At 26 years old, Hernández is already demonstrating remarkable technique and skill.

information.Player_physique: Standing tall at 184 cm and weighing 81 kg, Hernández's intimidating physique is complemented by his agile movement on the pitch.

47300.transfers: {"Transfer_1": "On July 6th, 2019, we witnessed Hernández making a significant move from Real Madrid to AC Milan with an impressive transfer fee of € 20M. 56396.statistics: {"player_appearances": "Messias has made a total of 26 appearances this season.","player_starts": "In these appearances, he has been part of the starting lineup in 14 games.","minutes_played": "Messias has accumulated a total of 1425 minutes of playing time so far.","player_position": "He has been deployed in the crucial role of an attacker in these games.","player_rating": "His performances have earned him a respectable average rating of 6.92.","substitution_statistics": "Messias has come off the bench 12 times and has been substituted out the same number of times. 56396.transfers: {"transfer_1": "Rewinding back to 2019, we saw the promising Brazilian, Messias, making his move from Gozzano to Crotone. The club recognized his potential early on and didn't hesitate to make the transfer.","transfer_2": "On August 31st 2021, the dynamic forward Messias was sent on loan from Crotone to the renowned Italian club, AC Milan. A decision that paved the way for his rise in the world of football.","transfer_3": "Adding another twist in his journey, on July 1st, 2022, Messias saw a brief return to Crotone from AC Milan. But his stay didn't last long, as the winds of transfer were blowing in another direction.","transfer_4": "Almost a week later, on July 7th, 2022, AC Milan decided to bring back their star player Messias from Crotone. His performance had been more than convincing during his loan spell.","transfer_5": "Later in the summer of 2023, on August 11th, the tables turned again as Genoa secured a loan deal for Messias. AC Milan had to let their prized possession go, albeit temporarily.","transfer_6": "Finally, on July 1st, 2024, Messias made a triumphant return to AC Milan from Genoa. This transfer window marked the completion of a full circle for this talented player."}

information.Nationality: Emblem of his country's rich football history, Brahim is proudly Spanish, adding his personal flair to the beautiful game.
information.Physical Statistics: Standing at a solid 171 cm and weighing in at 59 kg, Brahim might not be the tallest on the field, but he definitely packs a punch with his skill and agility.

news.3. Maldini-Generation trifft für AC Mila: In a thrilling Serie-A game, AC Milan's young talent, Daniel Maldini made a significant impact, scoring his first goal in the Italian top league and helping the team seize victory against Spezia Calcio. However, it was Abdelkader 'Brahim' Díaz who stole the show by scoring the decisive goal in the 86th minute, confirming Milan's 2:1 win and securing their temporary lead in the table standings. Díaz's last-minute contribution shows the potential he brings to this Milan side, continuing to make waves as a game-changer.

information.Player Introduction: On the pitch today, we have the versatile Fodé Ballo-Touré. The Senegalese national is known for his agility and powerful plays.
information.Age: Ballo-Touré, now 26 years old, has been playing professionally for quite a few years. His experience and maturity is evident on the field.
information.Birth Info: Born in the small town of Conflans-Sainte-Honorine in France on 3rd January 1997, Ballo-Touré brings a unique French flair to his gameplay.
information.Nationality: Despite his French birthplace, Ballo-Touré has chosen to represent Senegal on the international stage. His dedication to his heritage country is truly commendable.
information.Physicality: Standing 182 cm tall and weighing 70 kg, Ballo-Touré has the ideal physique for competitive football. His height and weight give him a distinct advantage on the field.

105.statistics: {"Appearances": "Ballo-Touré has made an appearance in 10 games so far.","Lineups": "He has been in the starting lineup for 5 of those matches.","Playtime": "Ballo-Touré has spent 445 minutes on the pitch.","Position": "He has been performing in the Defender position.","Performance_Rating": "Ballo-Touré, with his performance, has an average rating of 6.47.","Captainship": "However, he has not yet had the chance to wear the captain's armband.","Substitutions": "Ballo-Touré has been substituted in 5 times and out 3 times, with 27 appearances on the bench.","Shots": "He has taken 2 shots in total, with 1 of them hitting the target.","Goals": "Despite his efforts, Ballo-Touré has not yet scored a goal.","Passes": "He has made a total of 222 passes with an accuracy of 19%, and has made 4 key passes.","Tackles": "Ballo-Touré has made a total of 18 tackles, including 2 blocks and 3 interceptions.","Duels": "He has engaged in 75 duels and came out victorious in 38 of them.","Dribbles": "Ballo-Touré has attempted 10 dribbles, successfully completing half of them.","Fouls": "He has drawn 10 fouls and committed 12 in turn.","Disciplinary": "Ballo-Touré has received 2 yellow cards but has managed to avoid receiving a red card.","Penalties": "He has not yet won or committed any penalties, nor has he scored or missed any."}
105.transfers: {"Transfer_1": "Ballo-Touré's move from 'Fulham' back to 'AC Milan' happened on July 1, 2024, though the nature of the transfer isn't outlined.","Transfer_2": "Earlier, on September 1, 2023, we witnessed Ballo-Touré going on a loan spell from 'AC Milan' to 'Fulham'.","Transfer_3": "It was on July 18, 2021, when 'AC Milan' made a shrewd move to acquire Ballo-Touré from 'Monaco' on a free transfer.","Transfer_4": "Ballo-Touré's significant transfer took place on January 10, 2019, when he switched from 'Lille' to 'Monaco' for a reported fee of €11M.","Transfer_5": "Starting from humble beginnings, Ballo-Touré moved from 'Paris Saint Germain' to 'Lille' on a free transfer on July 1, 2017."}

1642.information: {'player_name': "Direct your attention to the field’s phenom - Franck Yannick Kessié, a force to be reckoned with on the pitch.", 'age': "Still in his prime, Kessié dazzles us with his performance at the ripe age of 27.", 'birth_date': "Since his birth on the 19th of December, 1996, Kessié has been destined for football greatness.", 'birth_place_origin': "Hailing from the city of Ouragahio, Kessié is a testament to the rich footballing heritage of Côte d'Ivoire.", 'nationality': "Embodying the spirit and talent of Côte d'Ivoire, Kessié proudly represents his country on the international stage.", 'physical_attributes': "Standing tall at 183 cm and weighing in at 74 kg, Kessié's athletic build is ideal for the physical demands of the game." }

1642.transfers: {"transfer1": "One could talk about Kessié's transfer history for hours. Let's take a moment to remember when he was transferred from AC Milan to Barcelona on 4th July 2022. A move that shocked many, as Kessié swapped his kit for free, not a sight often seen in the world of football.","transfer2": "But going back a little further, we can't forget Kessié's move from Atalanta to AC Milan back on 1st July 2017. It was a loan deal, but Kessié quickly made his mark and became an integral part of the squad.","transfer3": "And even before that, on 1st July 2016, Kessié moved from Cesena to Atalanta, where his talent started to shine. information.Name: Watching on the pitch today, we can't ignore the charismatic presence of Zlatan Ibrahimović.
information.Age: At 42 years old, Ibrahimović is a testament to longevity in a sport that can be incredibly demanding on the body.
information.Birth_Info: He's a proud son of Malmö, born in Sweden on the 3rd of October in 1981.
information.Nationality: Representing his Swedish roots on the global stage, Ibrahimović's commitment to his country of birth has always been unshakeable.
information.Physical_Stats: A towering figure at 195cm, and weighing in at a sturdy 95kg, Ibrahimović's physicality is an intimidating aspect of his playing style.

51070.transfers: {"Transfer_History_1": "On January 2nd, 2020, Ibrahimović made his return to Europe, leaving Los Angeles Galaxy on a free transfer to take up the mantle at AC Milan again.","Transfer_History_2": "Rewinding to March 23rd, 2018, Ibrahimović made a surprising move from Manchester United to the sunshine of Los Angeles Galaxy, again without a transfer fee.","Transfer_History_3": "The charismatic forward left Paris Saint Germain for Manchester United on July 1st, 2016 on a free transfer, bringing his immense talent to the Premier League.","Transfer_History_4": "Ibrahimović's shift from AC Milan to Paris Saint Germain on July 18th, 2012, an ambitious move that set Paris back € 21M.","Transfer_History_5": "On July 1st, 2011, Ibrahimović sealed a € 24M deal from Barcelona back to AC Milan, a return to the club where he had enjoyed a successful loan spell the previous season.","Transfer_History_6": "Ibrahimović's initial move to AC Milan came in form of a loan from Barcelona on August 28th, 2010.","Transfer_History_7": "His high-profile transfer from Inter to Barcelona on July 28th, 2009 for a staggering € 69.9M was a testament to his stature in the game.","Transfer_History_8": "On August 1st, 2006, Ibrahimović left Juventus for Inter Milan, a € 24.8M move that further solidified his place at the top tier of football.","Transfer_History_9": "A major step in his career came on August 1st, 2004, with a € 16M transfer from Ajax to Juventus.","Transfer_History_10": "Ibrahimović's major breakthrough transfer was from Malmo FF to Ajax on August 1st, 2001, a deal worth € 8.2M that marked the start of his illustrious career."}

489.coach: {"Personal Information": "Stefano Pioli, commonly addressed as S. Pioli, hails from the picturesque city of Parma in Italy. Now 58 years old, Pioli celebrates his birth anniversary every 20th of October since 1965.","Nationality and Birthplace": "Just like the birthplace, Pioli's nationality also traces back to Italy, the country known for its passion for football.","Coaching Career": "Pioli's coaching journey is as extensive as it is distinguished. He started in Salernitana in July 2003, from where he moved to Modena in June 2004. His stint with Modena lasted 2 years after which he joined Parma in June 2006. After Parma, Grosseto became his next destination in September 2007. A year later, he moved to Piacenza in June 2008. His journey then took him to Sassuolo in June 2009, followed by Chievo in July 2010. Pioli briefly coached Palermo in July 2011 before moving to Bologna in October the same year. He then went on to manage Lazio from July 2014 till April 2016, followed by his tenure at Inter Milan from November 2016 to May 2017. Fiorentina then saw his leadership from June 2017 till April 2019. Since October 2019, Pioli has been the driving force behind AC Milan, leading the team to new heights."}

fixture.information: Welcome ladies and gentlemen, let's throwback to the classic clash from 2021-09-12. A brilliant game it was, hosted at the legendary Stadio Giuseppe Meazza. Refereed by D. Chiffi, the match between AC Milan and Lazio truly offered a spectacle. AC Milan emerged victorious in the end, a well-deserved win!This was a part of the Regular Season - Round 3 and it sure did not disappoint fans. AC Milan, playing at home, dominated the game, and managed to secure a comfortable 2-0 victory against Lazio. Truly, the home advantage played its part!After a first half that ended with AC Milan leading by 1-0, Lazio were unable to break through the Milanese defense. In the end, the final whistle from D. Chiffi confirmed Milan's win with a full-time scoreline of 2-0, preserving the clean sheet.A 90-minute thrill that left the spectators at the edge of their seat! No goals added in extra time or penalties, as the game was decided in regular time. As we remember this fantastic fixture, we must appreciate both the teams for their resilient performance on the pitch.

venue: "Good evening from the iconic Stadio Giuseppe Meazza, located on Via Piccolomini 5, right here in the heart of Milano! With a capacity to hold just over 80,000 roaring supporters, the atmosphere is certainly electric. The pitch, a lush green blanket of grass, is in perfect condition for tonight's match. This is football theater at its very best!"
